Reviews.Title: Best battery life phone ever
Reviews.Author: sysadmin
Reviews.Content: This phone is a classical nokia design phone, very sturdy build, big battery, quick charging and compared to modern phones can last you a week+ on one charge...

Reviews.Title: Ok, phone.
Reviews.Author: jean
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a simple phone and cheap. A phone which performs the basic functions easily, that's your phone. If you look for something a little bit fancy you can take a pass at it. If you don't mind using a thick cell phone, it shouldn't bother you, that's a thick one. If you like slim phone forget it.I was looking for a cheap and solid phone to replace my Motorolla Razor, and this one made the trick well. The keys are not very comfortable but we get used to them.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 6010 I Don't Leave Home Without It
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: My review is not going to be much different from the other positive reviews. I bought my Nokia 6010 from Walmart in 2005 and signed up to the T-Mobile prepaid plan. I am retired and an empty-nester. I keep in touch mostly by email and FB. You couldn't ask for a simpler, easier to use, or more reliable basic cell phone than this. I replaced my original battery 2 years ago. You have to buy generic batteries now as factory batteries are no longer available. As far as I am concerned the generic battery is better, cheaper and holds its charge longer than the OEM battery. It is what it is. It is not an iPhone, or a flip phone or a texting phone or a camera phone. If you want a cheap, reliable cell phone you cannot beat this. My previous cell phone was a Moterola flip phone with Nextel. And, I have seen my brother's Samsung Android smart phone and I am just not interested in anything but a basic cell phone.

Reviews.Title: Hard to hear, sometimes garbled
Reviews.Author: Bobby Bamford
Reviews.Content: This phone speaker is not clear.  Hard to hear.I bought it so I wouldn't be texting and that works!

Reviews.Title: Practical
Reviews.Author: aaron kretz
Reviews.Content: This is a good solid phone. Easy to text while driving. Solid buttons for big fingers,none of this touchscreen or flimsy crap.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Linda Bermes
Reviews.Content: This cell phone was the perfect purchase to replace another phone. It is in excellent condition and is truly reliable.

Reviews.Title: A phone for a non-tech guy.
Reviews.Author: Phyllis E. Rose
Reviews.Content: There is no camera, no internet connection, no texting capability.  It is just what my husband wanted.  A simple phone that can beused as a phone is to be used.

Reviews.Title: Used phone sold as new.
Reviews.Author: L. E. Fox "lef2009"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product from "Dr. Cell Phone" because my 80 year-old father wanted the same phone he'd had before (with large keys).  Nothing on the Amazon site hinted that the phone was used, but it is clearly used and, I hope, refurbished.  If I could easily return it, I would, but the logistics (2 other family members; 3 cities) are just too complex.  BUYER BEWARE.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked for use with T-mobile, AT&T;, Cingular or any GSM carrier in the US or worldwide.
GSM/GPRS 850/1900 MHz
Large color display with bright blue backlit screen: 96 x 65 pixels, up to 4,096 colors
Multiple ring tones allow you to distinguish your phones ring
4.64 inches long x 1.95 inches wide x 0.87 inch thick
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Nokia 6010 Cell Phone for T-mobile and AT&T (cingular) Service (pre-paid or regular plan)
